idea: A LEADING ADVERTISING STUDIO NOW LAUNCHES JOB READY CERTIFIED COURSES IN MEDIA & DESIGN AT MIRA ROAD EAST, MUMBAI SQUARE MOON INSTITUTE OF MEDIA & DESIGN, WE MAKE ARTIST - LEARN THE SCIENCE BEHIND SUCCESSFUL SOCIAL MEDIA STAR

idea:
ICE India is a registered partnership firm as of 06 Feb 2012. ICE India is a full-service event planning and travel management company within the meetings, incentives, conferences, events (MICE) segment in the Indian event management landscape.

ICE India is proficient in managing domestic & international travel incentives, business conferences, corporate events and exhibitions.
name: ICE INDIA

idea: Infintrix Global Fintech Pvt Ltd is a treasury consulting player having expertise in implementation of various treasury platforms in banks and financial institutions across India and Middle East. Our aspirations are building a product in the risk management space considering we have immense expertise working on treasury since many years.
name: Infintrix Global Fintech Pvt Ltd

idea: Kall Trip P Ltd has a mission to provide curated  guided travel & tours for traveller which are sold online.  We help customers to manage the entire journey from end to end as well as curate and validate travel itineraries provided by travel suppliers from around the world.
name: KALL TRIP PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our idea is basically finding sharing rooms in hostel or any flat. We will provide location wise selection of perfect room with desired roommate in an economic range of the user. Indian habitants are fed up of hassel full searching for the perfect room and roommate. Manually searching for a perfect room, wandering around the city that too along with finding for a perfect roommate is really hectic and for a new person it is more difficult. Many people everyday migrate from one place to another place because of many reasons and the biggest question in front of them is where to stay ? And then we come to solve there problem. Before going to the destination one can search for the room they wish and can book it if they like it and the problem is solved. With Myroo one can also search for the type of roommate he or she wants. The one who's habbits or lifestyle matches with them. So we will provide a better living space with a better surrounding to our customer.
name: Myroo

idea:
The genesis of our name stems from an intriguing psycho-sociological study. If a ball is placed in front of you, you will pick it up and engage with it. Always and inevitably. We are that ball – the BrandBall. And we carry this clear and simple perspective into every piece of our work, consistently creating platforms for customers to engage and interact with your brand.



THE TINIEST THINGS. FOR THE BIGGEST DREAMS.

That’s really what our DNA is about. A group of us professionals dropped our streamlined corporate jobs in advertising and marketing, decided to follow our passion, came together and said, “let’s do this.”

If we’re being formal, we say BrandBall a tech-enabled new-age omnichannel agency aimed at bringing in the single point approach for the brands which are answerable for their ROI.

Simply put, we use technology and innovative thinking in our creative brand solutions. And then we take them into all sorts of media. Everywhere.

Because we believe no idea is ever too small to be great.
name: BrandBall LLP

idea: RYDZ, An innovative mobile based platform solution in transportation segment by Flusso Solutions Pvt Ltd, Connects Drivers of Taxis and Autos with nearby riders / Passengers online for ride.
name: FLUSSO SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The Company is engage in the business of providing online solutions for various games including fantasy sports and other related services by various modes with the use of IT and its applications.
Fanspole is a sports FANS platform where FANS come together and join the action by various Fantasy Games. You can play Free and Paid Fantasy Games in easy, secure and legal way. Our goal at Fanspole is to Provide Fantasy Players true value for their passion. We are a small team of young passionate people, working hard to make it the best experience for all Fantasy Players.
Fanspole is an online fantasy games platform connected with social theme where fantasy cricket games are hosted for users in India and have a website for desktop usage along with an android app for mobile friendly experience.
name: FANSPOLE ONLINE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ARGBISS INNOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED is a Mumbai based company working towards excellence in the Consulting, and believe in pursuing business through innovation and technology. Our team comes with several years of industry experience, and comprise of a highly motivated set of specialists. We are a experienced, dedicated and energetic team, cognizant of the market and our customer's requirements.


Our first product is Doctelloo that  is a Healthcare Ecosystem trying to get the HCP's and HCC's on a single platform. CONNECT to the app which is available for FREE in the Apple and Android app store.

Get all the INFORMATION required to stay up to date, both HCP's and HCC's can gain knowledge and share it on this Uni platform to become EMPOWERED.

ENGAGE through the chatting feature and built your own universe of Doctors, healthcare service providers and patients to seamlessly collaborate with each other.

Doctelloo is an effort to bring the healthcare industry together through complaint and trusted digital medium.
name: ARGBISS INNOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
